product_name: Thule Pack 'n Pedal Action Cam Mount
long_description: Designed to mount compact video cameras to your bike handlebars, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Action Cam Mount works with your Thule Handlebar Mount (sold separately) to help you capture your ride. Durable mount keeps camera securely positioned throughout all types of riding conditions. Camera mounts and dismounts in seconds with a simple click. Multiple camera mounting positions won't interfere with your ride while all the action is recorded. Works best with GoPro HD cameras (sold separately), but will work with virtually any action camera with included adhesive adapter plate. Offers enough space for an additional Thule Handlebar Mount accessory.
short_description: Designed to mount compact video cameras to your bike handlebars, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Action Cam Mount works with your Thule Handlebar Mount (sold separately) to help you capture your ride.
